about_the_game:
In The Labyrinth of Greed, you take on the role of a brave tomb raider, venturing into dangerous dungeons in search of ancient treasures. These relics are guarded by deadly traps and vigilant sentinels, challenging your agility and wit. Navigate through perilous pathways, collect all the precious artifacts, and avoid the dangers that lurk around every corner. This classic 2D puzzle game will test your strategic thinking, as only those who can outsmart the traps and guardians will reach the end and obtain a power that even the gods could only dream of.

Key Features:

Classic Gameplay:

Collect items and avoid dangers as you make your way through the labyrinth.

Traps and Guardians:

Face a variety of challenges, requiring both agility and cunning to overcome.

Ancient Treasures:

Discover and collect rare relics hidden deep within the labyrinth.

Challenging Dungeons:

Each level presents unique puzzles and trials to master.

Immersive Ancient World:

Explore atmospheric dungeons filled with mysteries and dangers, waiting to be uncovered.

These relics are guarded by deadly traps and vigilant sentinels, challenging your agility and wit. name: The Labyrinth of Greed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel quad-core 2.0 GHz or dual-core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core I5-4440, AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050, AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Dive into the Labyrinth of Greed and become a daring treasure hunter. Collect ancient relics, evade deadly traps, and outsmart the guards in this classic 2D puzzle game. Prove your worth and gain a power even the gods would envy!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Azerbaijani, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Afrikaans, Basque, Belarusian, Bangla, Bosnian, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Dari, Zulu, Hebrew, Igbo, Irish, Icelandic, Yoruba, Kazakh, Kannada, Catalan, Quechua, Kinyarwanda, K'iche', Konkani, Xhosa, Khmer, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Serbian, Sotho, Sinhala, Sindhi, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Uzbek, Uyghur, Urdu, Filipino, Hausa, Hindi, Croatian, Cherokee, Scots, Estonian
